organizations: University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center
lead_paragraph: Dr. Paul Thompson, a cardiologist at Hartford Hospital, said it is now known that if the heart is healthy, there is never a point at which it is too big.
snippet: Dr. Paul Thompson, a cardiologist at Hartford Hospital, said it is now known that if the heart is healthy, there is never a point at which it is too big.
